name: MarkdownRenderTest
description: Unit tests for the MarkdownRender class, ensuring that various scenarios do not cause failures or stack overflows.

test_cases.name: renderDoesNotFailWhenPropertyHasBeenRemoved
test_cases.description: Tests that rendering does not fail when a property has been removed from the OpenAPI specification.

test_cases.name: renderDoesNotCauseStackOverflowWithRecursiveDefinitions
test_cases.description: Tests that rendering does not cause a stack overflow with recursive definitions in the OpenAPI specification.

test_cases.name: renderDoesNotFailWhenHTTPStatusCodeIsRange
test_cases.description: Tests that rendering does not fail when an HTTP status code is a range in the OpenAPI specification.
